title: siva paDagai OTTum
sahitya:
shiva paDagai OTTum dEva dEvanai nambi cittam kalangAdiruppOm manamE



anupallavi



nAvAyiram ezhundu kUvi puraNDalaindu tAvum vinakkaDalil mEvum

karuNai koNDE  



caraNam



dukkhak-karum puyalgaL ekkip-porudiDilum dikku dishai arindu

shukkAnait-tiruppiyE

pakkuvamAga-taLLIp-parindaruL turai shErkkum paramporuL irukkaiyil bhayamillai tuyarillai
